levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Makes the ally with the highest Max HP within Attack Range more likely to be attacked by enemies, and when this ally receives an enemy attack, Vendela deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to the attacker and activates her Trait on the ally
